name: Arnav Singh Rajawat
summary: Experienced in Python, UI/UX, Machine Learning, C++, MySQL, HTML/CSS/JavaScript. Skilled in tools like Visual Studio, PyCharm, Figma, Wordpress, Amazon Workspace, Scikit-Learn. Proficient in Windows, macOS, Linux. Winner of 2024 Ideathon (ranked 9/80 teams) and served as Organising Committee member of Hacknova 24-hour hackathon. Class Representative in 2021. GitHub: Arnav Singh, HackerRank: Arnav Singh, LinkedIn: Arnav Singh, Portfolio: Arnav Singh.

work_experience.title: Web/Wordpress developer intern
descriptions: Managed and developed the company’s primary website
Created the Global News Index project
Contributed to the development of Safe Place to Work website
Enhanced skills in web development and WordPress
Collaborated with a team to deliver high-quality web solutions
